<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Symmetries and Their Properties-Part 1: Rotational Symmetry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symmetrie und ihr Eigenschaft-Teil 1: 
Rotationssymmetrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symétries et leur Propriété-Partie 1 : 
Symétrie de rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simetrias e sua Propriedade-Peça 1: 
Simetria Rotatória</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simmetria e la loro Proprietà-Parte 1: 
Simmetria Di rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμμετρίες και το ιδιοκτησία-μέρος τους 1: 
Περιστροφική συμμετρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simetrías y su Caracteri'stica-Parte 1: 
Simetría Rotatoria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site is a tutorial about the mathematical properties of rotations. There are four lessons, which include describing rotations, finding what doesn't change, relating rotations to symmetry, and the conclusion. Lessons include interactive applets and questions to enhance the concepts covered.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site ist ein Tutorial über die 
mathematischen Eigenschaften von Umdrehungen. Es gibt vier 
Lektionen, die das Beschreiben von von Umdrehungen einschließen und 
finden was nicht ändert und Umdrehungen auf Symmetrie und die 
Zusammenfassung in Verbindung stehen. Lektionen schließen 
interaktive applet und Fragen ein, um die umfaßten Konzepte zu 
erhöhen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site est un cours d'instruction au sujet des 
propriétés mathématiques des rotations. Il y a quatre 
leçons, qui incluent décrire des rotations, trouvant ce qui ne 
change pas, associant des rotations à la symétrie, et la conclusion.
Les leçons incluent les applet interactifs et les questions 
pour mettre en valeur les concepts couverts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local é um tutorial sobre as propriedades 
matemáticas das rotações. Há quatro lições, que incluem a 
descrição de rotações, encontrando o que não muda, relacionando 
rotações à simetria, e a conclusão. As lições incluem 
applet interativos e perguntas para realçar os conceitos cobertos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo è una lezione privata circa le 
proprietà matematiche delle rotazioni. Ci sono quattro lezioni,
che includono la descrizione delle rotazioni, trovando che cosa non 
cambia, collegando le rotazioni alla simmetria e la conclusione. 
Le lezioni includono i applet interattivi e le domande per 
aumentare i concetti coperti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή είναι ένα σεμινάριο για τις 
μαθηματικές ιδιότητες των περιστροφών. Υπάρχουν τέσσερα 
μαθήματα, τα οποία περιλαμβάνουν την περιγραφή των περιστροφών, 
βρίσκοντας τι δεν αλλάζει, αφορώντας τις περιστροφές τη 
συμμετρία, και το συμπέρασμα. Τα μαθήματα περιλαμβάνουν τα 
διαλογικές applets και τις ερωτήσεις για να ενισχύσουν τις 
έννοιες που καλύπτονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio es una guía sobre las características
matemáticas de rotaciones. Hay cuatro lecciones, que incluyen 
describir rotaciones, encontrando qué no cambia, relacionando 
rotaciones con la simetría, y la conclusión. Las lecciones 
incluyen applet interactivos y preguntas para realzar los conceptos 
cubiertos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
